description.raw:
the bottle builder scripts were only willing to push to the `osrfbuild` github account. I just built bottles in a [pull request](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/238/commits) from the `osrf` repo, and it failed to update the hashes:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pr_bottle_hash_updater/145/

but this branch fixes it:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pr_bottle_hash_updater/146/

If the `PULL_REQUEST_HEAD_REPO` variable is not set before calling `_homebrew_github_setup.bash` it will default to the `osrfbuild` repo, so make sure to set the target before calling that script.

but this branch fixes it:

If the PULL_REQUEST_HEAD_REPO variable is not set before calling _homebrew_github_setup.bash it will default to the osrfbuild repo, so make sure to set the target before calling that script.

title.raw: push to non-osrfbuild heads for brew pull requests
